product_name: SEN CHA Green Tea Leaf Mints
long_description: Freshen your breath while enjoying the flavor blends of SEN CHA green tea leaf mints. Dragon Fruit flavor combines the lightly sweet taste of dragon fruit with a dash of natural ginger to spice things up. Bombay Chai flavor includes natural cardamom, cinnamon, clove and a hint of vanilla for an indulgent mint with a medley of aromas. Tropical Mango flavor packs the sweet and juicy sensation of a mango into a mint. Moroccan Mint flavor features the fresh-cut flavor of crisp peppermint to wake up your taste buds, and spearmint and natural green tea extract to freshen your breath. 3 mints deliver the antioxidants found in 1 cup of green tea. SEN CHA green tea leaf mints are caffeine free and sugar free; naturally sweetened with stevia.
short_description: Freshen your breath while enjoying the flavor blends of SEN CHA green tea leaf mints.
